channel.title: Plan on Harry's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Harry's Blog

item.title: Christmas Resolution
item.description: $\text{Feliz Navidad Amigos!}$ The long-awaited Christmas break has finally arrived. No need to wake up at 6:30 or finish the boring data structure homework anymore. YES. That being said, I also don’t want my break to be me pointlessly surfing the Internet and wasting time. This break is meant to be a time to rest, be productive and explore new interests. Therefore, I decided to create the following list of goals:
